definition: To suffer from extreme hunger and eventually die due to lack of food, often used to describe a tragic fate resulting from prolonged starvation.

examples.german: Ich habe tagelang nichts gegessen und drohte zu verhungern.
examples.english: I hadn't eaten anything for days and was in danger of starving.

examples.german: Die Kinder in dem Kriegsgebiet verhungern aufgrund der Nahrungsmittelknappheit.
examples.english: The children in the war zone are starving due to food shortage.

examples.german: Tausende von Menschen verhungern jedes Jahr in ärmeren Ländern.
examples.english: Thousands of people starve to death every year in poorer countries.

examples.german: Die Obdachlosen in der Stadt haben oft Schwierigkeiten, nicht zu verhungern.
examples.english: The homeless people in the city often struggle not to starve.

examples.german: Es ist traurig zu sehen, wie viele Tiere in Tierheimen verhungern.
examples.english: It's sad to see how many animals starve in animal shelters.
